name: Hypatia Station
body:
Hypatia Station ============== Hypatia Station is a Space Station Thirteen server coded on a base of Bay Code with the good aspects of TG entwined as well as our own personal additions bunched in. Our preference of additions to the code is to improve aspects of realism, roleplay and enjoyability, rather than humour and immaturity. Hypatia exists as a expanse built on story and heavy roleplaying, as such we wish for our code to reflect that in improving roleplay and story-making potential for our players and admin team. With this in mind, any large or controversial changes to the server, such as adding economy or cloning (which change roleplay aspects with them,) or changing an area of the map/changing a job such as science to research differently (which changes gameplay aspects,) must be approved through our Head Developer Askarn/Owen or our fellow Rootmin HappyKitten. An example of additions and changes we have made: (Log begins late into the Hypatia cycle) http://hypatiastation.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=81 A more in-depth version of our changelog is available at the bottom of this page. An example of requested and suggested changes, showing what the players want: http://hypatiastation.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=8 Hypatia Changelog
Hypatia Station - A roleplaying SS13 server

Forum | Wiki | Source

Code licensed under GPLv3. Content licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0.

By playing to agreed to read and abide by the rules!

Hypatia Station Credit List
Code: 2884784276937S, Askarn (mostly Askarn), TwistedAkai
 Sprites: 33Harry33, Cassandra, NgDaniel6
 Thanks To:Baystation12, /tg/ station, Goonstation, Animus Station, Daedalus, and original Spacestation 13 devs. Skibiliano for the IRC bot.

23rd March 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Hypatia V.2 - Forked from Baystation Code

  • You are now able to surgically implant items into people.
  • A new report has been added to the Tau Ceti News.
  • Number of job slots has been increased substantially.
  • Various stability fixes.

3rd April 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Virology is now fixed. Be afraid, be very afraid.
  • Shuttle doors will now lock in flight
  • Assorted other bug fixes
  • Damage taken in the holodeck does not heal properly

9th April 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Events will now be much less frequent (and hopefully less annoying)
  • All Heads of Staff should now be able to message CentCom
  • Bugfixes (mostly to fire/atmospherics)

12th April 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Anomaly research has been upgraded to baystation standard. It can be undertaken in the northern mining outpost. May be buggy, report if things don't go as expected.
  • Some atmospheric changes; regrettably we must wave goodbye to transparant fire doors. Plasma now ignites at high temperature.
  • Methylphenidate, Citalopram and Paroxetine have been added.
  • Some bugfixes.

15th April 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Fixes some map issues, mainly relating to anomaly research. Still no shuttle I'm afraid.
  • Optimises slimes, should cause a bit less lag.

16th April 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Minor map changes. Shuttle to anomly research added.
  • Solars Arrays should now track properly.
  • Some more optimisation.

19th April 2013

Askarn updated:

  • Fixes to xenoarcheolgy.
  • Some stability fixes.

21st April 2013

2884784276937S updated:

  • Added "Chemical Preparation Crate"
  • Cyborgs can now open and close crates as well as lockers. Previously they could only open.
  • Newcasters can now be constructed. Circuits can be made at research.
  • Newscasters now accept the BBCode used on paper. Some changes may be made at a later point.
  • Various maximum input lengths have been extended. We trust you won't abuse this.
  • We now have a changelog!

21st April 2013

TwistedAkai updated:

  • "NanoTrasen Relationship" now works for all slots.

23rd April 2013

2884784276937S updated:

  • pAIs now feature a crew manifest much like PDAs, including SSD status.
  • Newcasters are now fixable.
  • (ADMINS) Admins now have instant-respawn, "GO ADMIN POWERS! GO!"
  • Changes to chemistry, added a new machine and an additional chemical dispenser.
  • Tweaks to the Donor rank.
  • (ADMINS) The "Dsay" proc is now accessible to all admins and moderators (and donors), will display appropriately. E.g. if moderator, "MOD(Annedu)", if donor "DONOR(2884784276937S)", if coder, "DEV(2884784276937S)", etc.
  • (ADMINS) Banhammer button. Tired of not being able to play that banhammer sound, lack of permissions? Well now you can, with the all new - BANHAMMER!
  • pAI door jack now unbolts doors, instead of just opening them.
  • (ADMINS) Moderators can now change their OOC colour.
  • Various additional spam filters, namely preventing white space spam - and falsifying server messages. As done several days ago.
  • Xenoarcheology's cyclcing doors, should, be fixed.
  • Revamping pAIs. Currently barely anything noticeable has been done.
  • Various additional bug-fixes, I've forgotten half of them.
Baystation 12 Development Team
